sentence.Network_en: Grapey: Tasting term a wine with smell or flavour reminiscent of fresh grapes or grape juice.
sentence.Network_cn: 葡萄的,葡萄似的: 品尝术语,指葡萄酒带有可令人联想到新鲜葡萄和葡萄果汁的气味或风味.

sentence.Network_en: She lifted the grapey, dark red juice to her parched mouth and drank.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把葡萄酒,黑红的酒水举到她干渴的嘴上喝起来.
